content: no sew easter peep crochet pattern this pattern was designed by the yarn sister facebook com/theyarnsister instagram @the_yarn_sister for questions reach out via socials or email theyarnsister@gmail com please do not resell modify or share this pattern please do not use any photos in this pattern as your own feel free to sell finished items made from this pattern but please acknowledge the yarn sister as the designer i look forward to being tagged in your finished projects so i can see your lovely creations thank you the yarn sister 1 easter peep crochet pattern what you need super bulky yarn i used loops & threads sweet snuggles lite 6 0mm hook 10mm & 8mm safety eyes polyfil stuffing scissors sewing needle abbreviations st/sts - stitch/stitches chain - chain magic_ring - magic_ring single_crochet - single_crochet slip_stitch - slip_stitch increase - increase decrease - invisible decrease f/o - fasten_off pattern notes i recommend a small piece of fabric behind the safety eyes to keep them from pulling through the stitches - never use safety eyes for items for children under 4 there are many great tutorials for a magic_ring and the invisible decrease available online if you are unfamiliar this pattern is written in us terms and the body is completed in continuous rounds the yarn sister 2 easter peep crochet pattern ears make 2 1 single_crochet 4 in magic_ring 4 2 *single_crochet increase* x 2 6 3-6 single_crochet all 6 4 rounds f/o first ear and leave tail to sew gap between ears do not fasten_off second ear you will join both ears together next round 7 single_crochet 6 around first ear continue to single_crochet 6 around second ear 12 8 *single_crochet increase* x 6 18 sew together gap between ears 9-10 single_crochet all 18 stuff ears 11 *single_crochet decrease* x 6 12 12 *increase* x 12 24 13-16 single_crochet all 24 4 rounds use 10mm eyes and place between rounds 7 & 8 about two stitches apart and centred with the ears 8mm nose goes one round down and between the eyes stuff head 17 *single_crochet decrease* x 8 16 add one extra 18 *decrease* x 8 8 round of single crochet in the head and one extra finish stuffing round in the body to adjust proportions for f/o and close up hole using extra chunky yarn that s it please tag me in your creations so i can see them and 😉 hoppy easter 3 the yarn sister
